Description:
Hotel de Paris is a charming boutique hotel that offers stylish rooms and a large courtyard garden perfect for enjoying a relaxing meal outdoors. A private bar with an open fireplace is suitable for a night cap.

Rooms and suites at De Paris are luxuriously furnished and offer air-conditioning, a minibar and a work desk. Every room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Private bathroom provides a hairdryer, a bathrobe and free toiletries.

The hotel is situated in the elegant area of the city full of bars and restaurants, and just a few steps away from the main institutions such as Parliament, Palace of Congress, Opera House, Art Gallery and Main Boulevard.

Ironing, laundry and dry cleaning services are available. The reception is open 24 hours a day and breakfast buffet is served each day.

The nearest bus stop is only 50 metres from the property, while the Main Bus Station can be reached in 300 metres. Tirana Airport is 15 km away.

Description:

We have total 18 rooms, some with mountain view and most with sea view, when you book please make sure which view you like most. Offering a restaurant, Hotel Prinos is located on the beachfront in Himare, just a 5-minute walk from Potam Beach. Breakfast is served every morning and the rooms offer sea or mountain views.

With free WiFi access, the guest rooms here will provide you with a TV, a fridge and air conditioning. They also have a balcony, and each room has a private bathroom that comes with a shower.

At Hotel Prinos you will find a mini-market and there is free public parking on site. Please inform Hotel Prinos in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Featuring a garden and a terrace, Hostel Soleil offers accommodations with free WiFi access in Buenos Aires. The guestrooms and common areas at the property feature a lively d�cor, and a daily breakfast is served. Museo de Arte Moderno de Buenos Aires is 300 metres away.

The comfortable guestrooms at Hostel Soleil feature air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a wardrobe. Some include views of the garden. Bathroom facilities are shared.

Guests at Hostel Soleil can make use of the shared kitchen and buy souvenirs at the gift shop. Barbecue facilities are also available.  Bicycles to tour the surroundings can be rented at the property and tourist information can be provided. Airport shuttles can be arranged.

Plaza de Mayo Square is 1.3 km from Hostel Soleil, while Cabildo is 1.3 km away. Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport is 8 km from the property. Description:
Set in a charming house overlooking the valley, Hosteria Los Canelos offers rooms with flat-screen TVs in El Calafate. A restaurant and a sun terrace are featured, and breakfast is provided.  Calafate Stream is 200 metres away.

Decorated with exposed brick walls, rooms at Los Canelos have large windows overlooking the valley. All of them have private bathrooms and work desks.

A continental breakfast is served daily. The restaurant prepares both regional and international specialties. There is also a wine bar boasting a wide variety of wines from local and international cellars.

Guests can sunbathe on the sun loungers available on the terrace, or book excursions at the tour desk. A gift shop is featured.

Description:
Offering BBQ facilities and free parking, Econo Lodge Hacienda International is just 5 minutes� drive from central Geelong. It features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and access to a shared patio.

Econo Lodge Hacienda is 5 minutes� drive from Eastern Beach, Geelong Hospital and the Geelong Waterfront. The famous Bells Beach and Avalon Airport are each a 30-minute drive away.

All rooms have a refrigerator, a tea and coffee maker and a desk. The bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms also have a microwave.

Breakfast and packed lunches can be arranged upon request. There are also a number of restaurants and supermarkets within a 2-minute walk. The property is within walking distance of the Geelong RSL and the Belmont Hotel. You may be charged up to the full amount at the time of booking.

Payment for your booking will appear as �Accommodation Payment Services� on your bank statement.

A non-refundable 2.2% Service & Handling Fee is applicable to all card payments processed online.

If the Full Payment has not been processed the balance amount will be collected at the motel at the time of check-in.

Each air-conditioned cottage offers a  TV and a kitchenette with a microwave, a refrigerator and a toaster. The private bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer. Some rooms include cable channels and a DVD player.

All air-conditioned rooms feature a dining area, toaster and tea and coffee making facilities. They offer a desk and ironing facilities. The bathroom has free toiletries.

Guests enjoy the convenience of room service. There is also a tour desk to organise local activities, and a business centre. A damage deposit of AUD 250 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

Address: 2 Murray Road, Cable Beach Cable BeachWestern Australia 6725
Description:
Cable Beachside features spacious, self-contained villas equipped with air conditioning and ceiling fans. A 5-minute walk from famous Cable Beach, villas are set in lush tropical gardens and feature a salt-water swimming pool.

Villas have carpeted flooring and wooden furnishings. They come with a separate lounge and dining areas, as well as laundry facilities. A DVD player with free in-house movies are provided. Each villa has an undercover car bay.

Guests can prepare meals in their private kitchen or have a barbecue with the covered facilities available. A variety of Broomes restaurants, bars and shops are available just a 10 minutes walk away from Cable Beachside Villas.

Tours and day trips can be arranged at Cable Beachsides tour desk.

The local bus service stops 2 minutes walk from the villas and China Town is a short 5-minute bus ride or car trip from the villas. The Broome Historical Society Museum is a 10-minute drive, whilst Broome Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Please inform Cable Beachside Villas in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Please note that a 2.2% surcharge applies for all payments with American Express and Diners Club credit cards.

Please note that a credit card pre-authorisation of AUD 500 is required upon check in.

Please note that this hotel has a strict "No Party Policy".

Description:
Featuring direct access to a safe swimming beach, these apartments offer free cable TV, private balcony or patio, and full kitchen and laundry facilities. Guests can enjoy ocean views from the outdoor pool.

Bargara Shoreline Serviced Apartments are located directly opposite Bargara Golf Course. Mon Repos Turtle Rookery is 7 km away. It is a 15-minute drive to the Bundaberg Rum Distillery.

All accommodation includes a toaster, tea/coffee making facilities, heating and air conditioning. Most have a full kitchen, while some have 2 bathrooms and views of the beach, pool or golf course.

Bicycle hire is available and the BBQ area overlooks the ocean. The patrolled area of Kellys Beach and The Basin is on your doorstep. There is a childrens playground located just next door. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that there is a 3% charge when you pay with an American Express credit card.

If you expect to arrive after 20:00 hours, please inform Bargara Shoreline Apartments in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

To access the free WiFi, please see reception to receive a voucher.

Description:
Meelup Bed & Breakfast is situated in Dunsborough, 5 km from Meelup beach and surrounded by famous wineries.

Each suite features a king bed, seating area, WiFi and temperature control. Guests are provided with complimentary flowers, fruit, port, chocolates and tea/coffee making facilities. A flat-screen TV with in-house movies, as well as an iPod docking station are featured. Rooms come with a private bathroom offering bathrobes, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast which includes offering of fruit, cereals, bread, jams, tea and a Nespresso coffee machine is available in the breakfast room. Each suite has an outdoor seating area on the sun terrace.

The Bed & Breakfast is located 10 km from Cape Naturaliste Lighthouse and Maritime Museum. Please inform Meelup Bed & Breakfast in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Located in Croydon, Baringa Villa offers free WiFi and free continental breakfast for the first 2 nights stayed. The 2-bedroom villa features a spa bath, a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony with garden and mountain views.

Baringa Villa Croydon is a 20-minute drive from Warratina Lavender Farm and a 30-minute drive from the Yarra Valley. Melbourne city centre is a 35-minute drive away and Melbourne Airport is a 45-minute drive.

The air-conditioned villa features a dining and lounge area with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and an iPod docking station. It has a coffee machine, BBQ facilities and an outdoor dining area. It has laundry facilities and 2 bathrooms with free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage for an additional charge.

Your continental breakfast includes muesli, fruit, toast, tea and coffee. Please inform Baringa Villa in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that Baringa Villa does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

Please note that there is no capacity for additional guests. The number of guests must be stated at the time of booking.

Description:
This fabulous three bedroom apartment has a galley style kitchen overlooking the living area with a private balcony. Guests will have access to 5star facilities such as the rooftop pool overlooking the city, library and fully equipped gymnasium. Situated in Melbourne, less than 1 km from Melbourne City Conference Centre and a 13-minute walk from State Library of Victoria, UrbanMinder @ The William offers free WiFi. The Block Arcade Melbourne is within 1.1 km of the apartment.

The apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. The air-conditioned apartment also features 2 bathrooms with a shower.

The apartment offers a fitness centre. An outdoor swimming pool can be found at UrbanMinder @ The William, along with a barbecue.

St Pauls Cathedral is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Marvel Stadium is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Melbourne Airport, 22 km from UrbanMinder @ The William. Description:
Boasting a waterfront location overlooking Noosa River, Sun Lagoon Resort features a private beach and a private boat jetty. It offers apartments with a private balcony and lagoon, river or pool views.

You can enjoy a game of tennis, or relax in the spa pool. Sun Lagoon Apartments also offer an outdoor swimming pool, a sauna and a games room with billiards. Paddle boards and kayaks are available for hire.

All apartments have laundry facilities and a full kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven. Each apartment has a separate living room with flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player.

The property is just 2 km from Hastings Street and Noosa�s Main Beach. Noosa National Park is a 10-minute drive, and Sunshine Coast Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

Sun Lagoon Resort is a Non-Smoking Resort therefore smoking is not permitted within the Resorts Property boundary. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Please inform Sun Lagoon Resort in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A damage deposit of AUD 200 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note there is no lift/elevator at this property. All 3 Bedroom Apartments are located on the higher floors and are accessed via stairs only.

Please note that reception opening hours are:
Monday to Saturday 08:30 to 17:00.
Sunday and Public Holidays reception is closed.

If arriving outside reception hours, please inform Sun Lagoon Resort in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Please note that Sun Lagoon Resort does not accept payment with American Express credit cards.

Located in Palm Cove, just 200 metres from Palm Cove Beach, Temple 304 Modern Spacious Palm Cove Resort provides beachfront accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, a restaurant, a bar and free WiFi. Featuring free private parking, the apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, diving and fishing.

The apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with pool views.

Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. If you would like to discover the area, snorkelling, canoeing and cycling are possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Clifton Beach is 700 metres from Temple 304 Modern Spacious Palm Cove Resort, while Ellis Beach is 2.5 km away. Description:
The Nautilus Holiday Apartments are situated in Port Douglas across the road from the famous Four Mile Beach.  Enjoy spacious self-contained apartments opposite the beach and 10-minutes from Macrossan Street.

Choose between the one, 2 and 3-bedroom self-contained apartments.  Each unit includes a spacious open-plan living and dining area plus a kitchen.  All of the units feature a private balcony or courtyard too.

Facilities on-site include a saltwater swimming pool and a barbeque area.  Beach and snorkelling gear for children can be hired and bicycle hire is also possible.

The Nautilus Holiday Apartments are well-positioned for enjoying the beach, the marina and all the shops and caf�s of Port Douglas. Guests need to meet one or more requirements to stay in this property: proof of full Coronavirus (Covid-19) vaccination, a recent valid negative Coronavirus PCR test, or recent proof of Coronavirus recovery.
Please let Nautilus Holiday Apartments know your expected time of arrival if you would like to organise an airport shuttle service. Please let the property know whether children are included as prices may be altered accordingly.

The exterior of the property is being painted during November 2017. At times during the day, from Monday to Friday machinery and pressure washers will be in use.

Description:
Set in Roma, 22 On Bowen offers 3-star accommodation with a terrace and barbecue facilities. With a garden, the 3-star motel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service and luggage storage space for guests.

All guest rooms come with a fridge, microwave, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and some units at the motel have a balcony. At 22 On Bowen all rooms have bed linen and towels.

The nearest airport is Roma Airport, 4 km from the accommodation. Please note that there is a 3.5% charge when you pay with an American Express or Diners Club credit card.

Description:
Located in Bischofshofen, Oberwinklgut offers rooms and apartments with access to an outdoor pool and a spa centre. Free WiFi is available.

The apartments have mountain views and come with a flat-screen satellite TV, a kitchen, a living room with a sofa and a bathroom with a bath or a shower. Some also feature a balcony.

Activities in the surrounding area include skiing, golfing, cycling and horseback riding. At Oberwinklgut, guests will also find a terrace, a shared lounge and barbecue facilities.

The property is 11.5 km from Lichtensteinklamm and 7.6 km from Doppelsesselbahn Hahnbaum. Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport is located 46 km away. Please inform Oberwinklgut in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that the property is located 210 metres above the village of Bischofshofen, and might  cause a great effort for the cyclists.

Description:
Set in Dorfgastein, 16 km from Bad Gastein Railway Station and 32 km from Zell am See-Kaprun Golf Course, Ladinger, Landhaus offers accommodation with free WiFi and a terrace.

Each unit comes with a seating area, a TV with cable channels, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries. A fridge, a dishwasher and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy hiking and skiing nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Eisriesenwelt Werfen is 44 km from Ladinger, Landhaus, while GC Goldegg is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport, 82 km from the accommodation. Managed by a private host

Description:
HeadLine : In the city center

Location : A stay at this aparthotel places you in the heart of Feldbach, a 1-minute drive from Pannonia and 7 minutes from Zotter. This aparthotel is 5.4 mi (8.8 km) from Vulcano Ham Factory and 6.8 mi (11 km) from Riegersburg Castle.

Rooms : Make yourself comfortable in this apartment, which features heated floors and a flat-screen TV. A kitchenette is outfitted with a refrigerator and a stovetop. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include a laptop-compatible safe and a desk, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli serving guests of this aparthotel. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

Description:
Featuring mountain views, Apartment Urgbach Apart by Interhome provides accommodation with a balcony and a coffee machine, around 35 km from Area 47. Boasting free private parking, the apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as skiing and cycling.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a satellite TV and a kitchenette with a fridge and dishwasher.

Fernpass is 47 km from the apartment, while Lake Resia is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Innsbruck Airport, 74 km from Apartment Urgbach Apart by Interhome. Please note that the full amount of the reservation is due before arrival. Interhome will send a confirmation with detailed payment information. After full payment is taken, the propertys details, including the address and where to collect keys, will be emailed to you.
Please inform Apartment Urgbach Apart by Interhome in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A damage deposit of EUR 100 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
1 Babycot available, free of charge.

Description:
HeadLine : In the mountains

Location : Located in Fliess, this apartment is in the mountains, within a 15-minute drive of Naturpark Kaunergrat Pitztal-Kaunertal and Kaunertal Glacier Ski Area. This apartment is 15.3 mi (24.6 km) from Serfaus-Fiss-Ladis and 16.8 mi (27 km) from Alpine Coaster.

Rooms : Make yourself comfortable in your individually furnished apartment, featuring a refrigerator and a microwave. The bathroom has a shower/tub combination and a hair dryer. Conveniences include a coffee/tea maker and a washer/dryer.

Description:
Just 1 km from the centre of Gerlos, Gerlos Alpine Estate offers exclusive apartments and penthouses and is 2 km from the nearest ski lift. All contemporary Alpine-style units boast a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking station, DVD player and free WiFi.

Stylish apartments also come with a fully equipped kitchenette and open plan living area. Each has a balcony and the kitchenettes feature a dishwasher, coffee machine and dining area. Some offer a private sauna.

A free ski shuttle bus stops a 5-minute walk from the property. Shops and restaurants are in Gerlos. Free on-site parking is provided. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Gerlos Alpine Estate in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
A damage deposit of EUR 450 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.
Please note that the deposit is by bank transfer only, credit cards cannot be charged prior to arrival. Guests receive bank details after booking.

Description:
Hotel Victoria - adults only is located in the centre of Gerlos, directly opposite the Dorfbahn cable car. Shops, restaurants and the ski slope can be found directly at the hotels doorstep.

Each room offers a balcony with mountain views, a flat-screen cable TV, a safe, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Free WiFi is available in public areas.

Guests can enjoy drinks and a small selection of food at the cosy hotel bar or on the sun terrace.

The hotel has a new sauna area with infrared sauna, a Finnish sauna, a herbal sauna and a relaxation area.

sThe ski bus stop is right outside Hotel Victoria Garni and the Dorfbahn Gerlos just in front.

Underground parking spaces are available for a surcharge.

You can enjoy cocktails, delicious dishes & homemade ice cream on the cozy sun terrace.

In summer, the lift ticket for the mountain railways in the Zillertal Arena is included in the price. Please inform Hotel Victoria - adults only in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.

Description:
Pension Ladner offers a scenic location right at the shore of Lake Grundlsee, in the Styrian part of the Salzkammergut Region.  All rooms offer views of the lake.

The bright, individually furnished rooms are equipped with lots of wood and solid wood furniture. They feature satellite TV, a refrigerator, and a bathroom with hairdryer. The water in the bathrooms comes from the house�s own source.

Pension Ladner�s restaurant serves traditional Styrian dishes, fish right out of the lake, and Styrian wines. Guests can also dine in the Erzherzog Johann Lounge dating from 1799. The building�s foundation walls date from 1250.

A natural swimming beach is only a few steps away, and a bus stop right next to the property. Hiking and cycling trails are nearby. Please inform Pension Ladner in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Located in Herrnbaumgarten in the Weinviertel region, this winery features a garden with traditional arcades and an outdoor pool. Guests can relax on the sun terrace and rent bicycles to explore the surrounding vineyards.

The spacious rooms and apartments at Weingut Bohrn Himmelbett feature a terrace, wooden floors, and satellite TV. Each unit has a bathroom with hairdryer, and the apartments also include a kitchenette.

Guests of the Bohrn Weingut can use a free internet terminal and play table tennis. The garden includes a sun terrace, barbecue facilities, and a children�s playground. Free public parking is possible nearby.

Poysdorf has a golf course and is 6 km away. Valtice Castle in the Czech Republic is 10 km away. Please inform Weingut Bohrn Himmelbett in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
When travelling with dogs, please note that an extra charge of 12 Euro per dog, per night applies.

Description:
The air-conditioned Hotel Nationalpark is located in Illmitz in the heart of the Neusiedlersee-Seewinkel National Park and offers an outdoor pool, a spa area, free WiFi, a garden with barbecue facilities, and a restaurant.

All of the elegantly furnished rooms at the Nationalpark Hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a modern bathroom.

A buffet breakfast and fine international cuisine can be enjoyed in the restaurant or on the garden terrace.

Spa facilities include a sauna, a steam bath, a sunbathing terrace, and an infrared cabin. Massages, towels and bathrobes are available on request.

The nearest beach at Lake Neusiedl and the ferry port to M�rbisch are 5 km away from Hotel Nationalpark. The surrounding national park is very popular for birdwatching.

Description:
The charming garden of Appartement Breitlehn overlooks the �tztal Valley and offers stunning views of the surrounding Alps. It offers large, family apartments with full kitchens and private balconies. WiFi is provided.

The parquet floored apartments all have a cosy seating area with TV and satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with free soap and shampoo products.

The kitchen is equipped with a stove top, a dishwasher, an oven, microwave and kitchen utensils. Guests can use the silverware and serving dishes and enjoy their meal at the dining area. Other kitchen amenities include a tea/coffee maker and refrigerator.

Guests of Breitlehn Appartement can relax and enjoy quiet surroundings and views of the surrounding landscape from the hotels sun terrace. The younger guests can play at the playground with trampoline.

The famous ski resort of S�lden is 8 km away. The Aqua Dome is within 1.5 km of Appartement Breitlehn.Cross-country skiing is a popular activity in the region.

Free private parking and a ski storage room with ski boot dryer are available on site. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
If you travel with children, please inform the property of the total number and their ages prior to arrival. You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property.

Description:
Located in Braz between the Arlberg mountain and Bludenz, Walchs Camping & Landhaus offers a wellness area, a 10,000 m� garden, and free access to the public outdoor pool. The Sonnenkopf Ski Area is a 7-minute drive away, and the free ski bus stops 100 metres away.

A cross-country skiing track passes right by the house. During summer you can also take part in guided hiking tours.

Within a 20-minute drive, you can reach 5 ski areas, and within a 2-minute drive, you can reach the public outdoor pool in Braz, which is accessible for free. The 18-hole Bludenz-Braz Golf Course is 3 km away. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Late check-in is available upon prior arrangement.

Description:
Located in the small village of Innerkrems next to the Nockberge National Park, Kinder- und Familienhotel Nockalm has a 13,000 m� adventure playground and offers many activities for children.

The rooms at the Nockalm Hotel offer satellite TV, a bathroom with hairdryer, and a safe. Some have a balcony. Wi-Fi access is free of charge in the entire hotel.

A spa area with an indoor pool and a restaurant serving Austrian and international cuisine are available at Hotel Nockalm. During summer guests can enjoy the all inclusive catering and during winter full-board is offered.

Summer activities include guided hikes, farm visits, campfires, karaoke, and archery. Mountain bikes can be rented, and there is large trampoline. Children can use scooters, pedal cars, and electric cars.

In winter, Kinder- und Familienhotel Nockalm is right next to the ski slope. Cross-country ski runs and illuminated toboggan runs are also available.

Description:
Located in the Stubaital Valley, Appartement Elisa is set amidst beautiful mountains in Neustift im Stubaital. It offers a traditionally furnished apartment with a balcony, a kitchenette and free Wi-Fi.

The apartment has wooden floors and is equipped with a safe and a sofa. Kitchenware, a microwave, and a dishwasher are provided in the kitchenette.

Appartement Elisa provides a ski storage room. The free ski bus stops 200 metres from the guest house. Hochstubai Cable Car can be reached within 1.7 km.

Restaurants, shops and supermarkets can be found in the town centre. It is 500 metres away. Innsbruck can be reached within 20 km. Guests will be contacted by the hotel after booking for arranging bank transfer of deposit.

Description:
Overlooking the Stubai Valley and set on a hillside above the village, Haus Fernblick is 700 metres from the Elfer Ski Lift and 1 km from the centre of Neustift. It offers an infrared cabin and free WiFi.

Featuring bright wooden furniture, the rooms offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a refrigerator, and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Most of the rooms offer a balcony.

The daily breakfast buffet includes fresh fruit. The Fernblick�s garden includes a sun terrace and a children�s playground. Guests can play table tennis and use a ski storage room.

Free private parking is available on site. Guests enjoy free admission to Neustift�s public indoor pool and the property offers a free shuttle to the next bus stop. The Stubai Glacier is 18 km away. Please note that snow chains are recommended in winter.

Description:
Apart Christa is located in Kaunertal and offers self-catering accommodation with a mountain-view terrace and free Wi-Fi access. The Feichten Ski Lifts are just 150 metres from the apartment and the Fendels Ski Area is 15 km away, while the Kaunertaler Glacier Ski Area is within 22 km.

The apartment features cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully equipped open-plan kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer.

A restaurant and a grocery shop are 150 metres from the property. A cafe can also be found just 100 metres away.

At Apart Christa you will find barbecue facilities. Other facilities like ski storage are offered. Activities in the surrounding area include skiing, cycling and hiking. The property offers free parking.

The Ried Swimming Lake is 14 km away. The Serfaus-Fiss-Ladis Ski Area is 22 km away. Please inform Apart Christa in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Located less than 1 km from Niederau town centre and several ski lifts, several shops and restaurants are within 300 metres of Pension Leitenhof. All units at the Pension have a balcony with views of the surrounding mountains.

Also featured in the rooms are wooden furniture and a bathroom. Additionally, apartments have a kitchen, dining area, dishwasher, living room and satellite TV. A buffet breakfast is served each morning.

The property has an outdoor swimming pool, table tennis facilities, a ski cellar and a garden with deckchairs and a playground. Wi-Fi and parking are available free of charge. The local ski bus stops just 400 metres from the Pension.

Hotel guests receive the Wildsch�nau Card free of charge. This card comprises many benefits in winter and summer, such as admission to local museums, guided hikes, use of the cable cars, access to the public swimming pool in summer and much more. Please inform Pension Leitenhof in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
This hotel offers various saunas and is located next to the Sonnen Cable Car of the Serfaus-Fiss-Ladis Ski Area, Das Landerer offers modern Alpine-style accommodation with views of the surrounding mountains.

The accommodation comprises wooden furnishings and bright d�cor. All units come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, free bathrobes, and a balcony or a terrace. The property provides daily cleaning service also for the apartments.

Daily breakfast offers fresh, home-made products. Restaurants, souvenir shops and a super market are 5 minutes away in the city centre of Fiss-Ladis.

In winter, guests can ski directly to the property and make use of the sauna and the steam bath on site. There is also a water world with an indoor swimming pool. Guests can relax on a panoramic terrace, in the garden or as well in a game room. A massage service or cosmetics treatments provided as well. Ski passes can be purchased at the reception. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Das Landerer in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Smart Chalet Ladis is located next to the Serfaus-Fiss-Ladis cable car, and a restaurant, supermarket and regional bus stop providing transport to Serfaus, Landeck and Nauders are all within 150 metres.

Apartments at the Ladis have a terrace or balcony, satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower and toilet. A bread delivery service is available upon request and against a surcharge.

Description:
Offering spacious rooms with a balcony, Strass- Aparthotel is located in Mayrhofen�s centre, right next to the gondola. Guests can make free use of Sporthotel Strass� wellness and sports facilities.

With a seating area and work desk, all rooms at Strass Aparthotel come with carpeted floors and a safe. The rooms feature a private bathroom with either a bathtub or shower.

A covered bridge leads immediately to the nextdoor building with its oriental-style spa, indoor pool and massage room. Sporty guests can play tennis, squash or visit the gym.

Breakfast can be served in the light winter garden, which has large windows. Like the bar with its live music, the restaurant offers a chic ambiance for dinner with its gold-coloured columns. Half board is available and includes a 4-course dinner.

The Zillertal ski area is situated 3 km from the hotel. Innsbruck, Swarovski Wattens and Silver Mine Schwaz are all less than 60 km away.

Solid wood furniture is a characteristic feature of the accommodation and all have a private bathroom and a seating area with satellite TV. Private parking is available free of charge.

There is also a spa area with a Finnish sauna, a steam bath, a hydro-massage shower and a relaxation room. The Fernblick G�stehaus has a ski storage.

Sautens village centre is just 200 metres away, whilst the nearest ski lift is 3 km away. The Aqua Dome Thermal Spa and the K�htai and S�lden ski areas can all be reached by car in under 30 minutes. Description:
Located 2 km from Jerzens and offering a panoramic view of the mountains, this traditional guest house offers an on-site lounge bar and restaurant. A bus stop offering a free shuttle bus to the ski slopes is located 20 metres from the guest house.

Guest rooms at Pension K�hler xxx Fr�hst�ckspension incl Sommercard xxx have a traditional Alpine decor and are equipped with a seating area and cable TV. All rooms offer views of the surrounding mountains and some have a balcony.

Breakfast is served daily at the guest house and for other meals traditional food is offered in the restaurant. Meals can be enjoyed in the garden when the weather is nice.

During their stay guests can relax in infrared cabins or in the guest lounge equipped with a TV. Additional facilities available include ski storage and a drying room.

Free private parking is available on site and an airport shuttle from Innsbruck Airport can be organised upon request for a supplement. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests driving through Inntal Autobahn should take the L16 Country Road instead of L243, as it is the shorter way to the property.

The Pitztal Summer Card is included in the rate from early June until mid October and offers free access to local cable cars and buses as well as other activities.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Rauris Gold Panning Site

Location : With a stay at Rauriserhof in Rauris, you ll be near ski lifts, just a 5-minute walk from Rauris Valley Ski Area and 6 minutes by foot from Kreuzboden Ski Lift. This 4-star hotel is 15.2 mi (24.5 km) from Lake Zell and 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Hochalm Cable Car.

Rooms : Stay in one of 76 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature spring water baths and complimentary toiletries.

Dining : Grab a bite to eat at the hotel s restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at the bar/lounge, take in the garden view, and even dine alfresco. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM.

Description:
Built in 1853 and right on the picturesque F�rstenweg, a small path leading to Neuschwanstein Castle, Gutshof zum Schluxen enjoys a quiet location in the middle of fields with grazing cows and horses, and Queen Marie von Bayern stayed here with her sons Ludwig and Otto. F�ssen and Reutte are only a 10-minute drive away.

The former estate offers rooms in a Tyrolean style, some of which have a balcony. Additional pillows and blankets are available on request and at a surcharge.

Gutshof zum Schluxen also offers a bicycle rental, free parking, and free WiFi access.

Neuschwanstein Castle and Hohenschwangau Castle can be reached on foot in about 1 hour, in 30 minutes by bicycle, or in 15 minutes by car. Linderhof Caslte is a 45-minute car drive away.

In winter, a cross-country ski run is right outside Gutshof zum Schluxen. The nearest ski area is 12 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Located directly on the shore of Lake Wolfgang, in the scenic village of Ried, Hotel Seehang Garni offers a private beach and a lakeside lounge. The shipping pier is a 3-minute walk away, and St. Wolfgang is 1 km away.

The rooms and apartments all feature a balcony, satellite TV, and a bathroom. Most rooms have lake views. A rich breakfast buffet is available in the morning.

The Seehang Hotel Grani offers a private sunbathing lawn with deck chairs and sunshade right by the lake. Rowing boats are provided.

From June to September, drinks and snacks are served in the See Lounge (in fair weather). Please inform Hotel Seehang Garni in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Boasting a garden, bar and views of mountain, Gasthof Restaurant Steirereckn is situated in Schwanberg, 48 km from Graz Central Station. Among the facilities at this property are an ATM and dry cleaning services, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy garden views.

At the inn, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The rooms have a wardrobe.

The daily breakfast offers vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free options. At Gasthof Restaurant Steirereckn you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Austrian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Schwanberg, like hiking, skiing and cycling.

Casino Graz is 48 km from Gasthof Restaurant Steirereckn, while Eggenberg Palace is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Graz, 44 km from the inn, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Located in a private property in St.Gilgen only 50 metres from the shores of Lake Wolfgang, the Sonnwirtst�ckl offers en-suite studios. They comprise a tea kitchen with refrigerator and espresso machine and a living/sleeping area with flat-screen cable TV.

Free WiFi is available in the entire property. On request, fresh bread rolls can be delivered to your studio. Built in 1900 in traditional Salzkammergut Style, the Sonnwirtst�ckl is decorated with wooden beams, hardwood floors with little carpets and colourful curtains and bed linen in the bright rooms.

The property is located near a yacht club and tennis court, and a public beach and bathing pier are located in front of the building. Bathrobes and canvas chairs can be requested for free. The closest supermarket is a 4-minute drive away.

St.Gilgen Bus Station is 900 metres away from the Sonnwirtst�ckl. Salzburg Train Station is 30 km away, while Salzburg Airport is 40 km from the property. A pick-up service from the airport or the train station can be arranged. The Zw�lferhorn Cable Car is a 5-minute car drive away.

6 different golf courses can be reached by car within 20 minutes, and walking and running paths run by the Sonnwirtst�ckl. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Hotel Pension Adria enjoys a central location just a 5-minute walk away from Viennas Town Hall, Vienna University and the Schottentor Underground Station. It offers en-suite rooms with cable TV. Free WiFi is available in all areas and some rooms also feature a small fridge.

Right opposite Pension Adria you can find the Altes AKH University Campus with its quiet park and several restaurants. Other cafes offering breakfast are in the immediate vicinity of the property. On request, coffee and tea are offered.

From the Schottentor stop of the U2 underground line, you can quickly reach the Hofburg Palace, the Vienna State Opera and the most important museums.

Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.5 km from Messe Wien.

All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At the niu Franz every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Languages spoken at the reception include German and English.

St. Stephens Cathedral is 4.1 km from the niu Franz, while Austria Center Vienna is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 20 km from the hotel. Please note that children up to 12 are charged half of the regular breakfast rate (7.75�). Children aged 12 and above receive the full price (15.50�).

Offering 1 bedroom, this air-conditioned apartment features 1 bathroom with a shower, a bath and a hairdryer. There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchen complete with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven.

The property is situated 34 km from Ried Exhibition Centre, 36 km from Wels Exhibition Centre and 40 km from Zoo Schmiding. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. Rooms include a private bathroom, while certain rooms have a kitchen with an oven. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Description:
Accessibly designed Jagerwirt is a typical Tyrolean guesthouse in the village of Volders with a long tradition for over 500 years. It offers free parking and a rich breakfast buffet. Free WiFi is available.

All spacious en-suite rooms provide satellite TV and a desk. Most rooms also have a balcony. Several rooms also have special wheelchair accessible bathrooms with bath lifts. The final cleaning fee and the city tax are already included in the room rates.

The Jagerwirt restaurant serves excellent Tyrolean and international cuisine, accompanied by fine wines from the propertys own wine cellar.

Guests can use the spa area at the Alpenrelax Krepperh�tte, including a Finnish sauna, an infrared cabin, a steam bath, a relaxation room and an outdoor Kneipp basin, which is a 15-minute drive away and situated at 1352 metres above sea level.

In winter, guests can go skiing at one of the various ski areas nearby. Sledges can also be rented free of charge. An ice skating rink is 1.5 km away. Several hiking and cross-country skiing trails can be reached within 4 km.

The city of Innsbruck is only 10 km away. Crystal World of Swarovski in Wattens can be reached within 2 km. A golf course is 8 km from the Jagerwirt.

At Hotel La Chaumiere you will find a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, luggage storage and an ironing service.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, Brussels is 12 km from the accommodation. Brussels Airport is 21.2 km away. The property offers free parking. Please inform Hotel La Chaumiere in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
As a result to the inflation of energy prices, we had to increase our rates.
We apologize for this inconvenience and hope to find a solution as soon as possible.

Description:
Soll Cress is a family-run 3 star superior hotel situated opposite the coast tram stop, 450 metres from the beach in Koksijde. It features an indoor swimming and a cosy bar with free WiFi.

The rooms at Familiehotel Soll Cress Koksijde are simply furnished and come equipped with a TV and telephone. They also each have their own private bathroom.

Hotel Soll Cress includes wellness facilities including a fitness centre, sauna and spa bath. All of these spa services are available for an extra charge. The indoor swimming pool with Multi Jet is free of charge.

The hotels restaurant has been completely refurbished in October 2018 and serves daily-changing dishes with fresh ingredients from the local market. The hotel also offers packed lunches for guests wishing to explore the local area.

The city centre of Koksijde is a 15-minute walk away. Golf Ter Hille is 3.2 km from the hotel. De Panne, featuring Plopsaland, is 4.5 km from the hotel and accessible via the tram stop in front of the hotel. Dunkerque, over the French border, is a 30-minute drive. Free parking is available on site. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay.
When booking half board, please note that drinks are not included.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Counsel House

Location : With a stay at Corbie Lommel in Lommel, you ll be within a 5-minute walk of Counsel House and Glass House. This hotel is 0.2 mi (0.4 km) from Adelberg Amusement Center and 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Burgemeester Park.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 33 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 9 AM.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same property / stay dates)
  • This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted
  • Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property

Special Instructions : There is no front desk at this property. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests planning to arrive outside of normal check-in hours must contact this property in advance to arrange check-in.

Description:
Offering an � la carte restaurant and a private beach area, Oostappen Vakantiepark Parelstrand NV benefits from green surroundings in Lommel. This park features entertainment staff, a children�s club and playground as well as bicycle rental services.

Each chalet, holiday home or tent is fitted with kitchenware, a refrigerator and outdoor furniture. There is a coffee maker. Some of the units include a living room with a TV and/or a kitchenette. The accommodations have private or shared bathroom facilities.

At Oostappen Vakantiepark Parelstrand NV, guests can visit the supermarket for groceries or visit the restaurant and bar to enjoy a meal or refreshing drink.

You can rent a bicycle to explore Lommel, play a game of mini golf or go to the private beach. The younger guests can enjoy themselves in the playground.

Oostappen Vakantiepark Parelstrand NV is 5.6 km from the centre of Lommel and 9.8 km from Overpelt. The town of Eindhoven in the Netherlands is a 25-minute drive from the holiday park. Description:
Uilenspiegel offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi, 75 metres from the beach in the centre of Nieuwpoort-Bad. This hotel is located less than 5 minutes walk from the main shopping street. It is 100 metres from the coast tram.

Each of the rooms at Hotel Uilenspiegel has a colour TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the 5th-floor breakfast room offers scenic views of the sea and IJzermonding.

The centre of Koksijde is just over a 10-minute car journey away. Using the coast tram line guests can visit many towns and attractions along the coast. Bruges and Oostende can be reached within 30 minutes by car from Uilenspiegel Hotel. There is a private car park within a 5-minute walk of the hotel (depending on availability). Secure cycle storage is also available.

The holiday home has 6 bedrooms, a kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, and 3 bathrooms with a shower, a hairdryer and a washing machine. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are offered.

At the holiday home guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. A childrens playground and barbecue facilities are available for guests at Gite le Ravel to use.

Description:
B&B Maison Beau is set in the peaceful village of Zonhoven, 6 km from the centre of Hasselt. It features a spacious room with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. Wellness facilities and an outdoor pool are also available for an extra fee and upon request.

The room features a modern d�cor and comes with box-spring bedding and a tea/coffee maker. The large bathroom includes a walk-in shower and free toiletries are provided. Breakfast is served every morning in your room.

For a charge, guests at B&B Maison Beau can benefit from private access to the pool, the spa bath, sauna or the Turkish steam bath.There is also the possibility of massage treatments. The wellness centre is accessible for an additional fee as well.

By car, the Limburg Golf and Country Club is 8 km. The Jenevermuseum in Hasselt is 10 km. Please note that breakfast is only bookable for 2 people or more.

Rooms at the Hoeve Langhof come with a private bathroom with shower and a toilet. They offer direct access to the garden terrace, a TV, a DVD player and internet connection. WiFi is available as well.

Guests can prepare meals in the on-site kitchen. The barbecue facilities are ideal for open air meals.

Hoeve Langhof is 58 km from the theme park Plopsaland and 1 km from the beach resort of Wenduine. De Haan is 5 km away, while Blankenberge Railway Station is less than 6 km from the B&B. Free private parking is also provided. Please inform Hoeve Langhof in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Hotel Kardjali is set in Kardzhali, 50 metres from the town�s bus terminal and a 7-minute walk from the centre. You can benefit from free access to Wi-Fi and secured parking on site. Spa services are available as well.

All units at the Kardjali Hotel are spacious and comprise a TV with cable channels and mini bar. Some are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette.

Breakfast is available and can be served in the rooms. The in-house restaurant offers a variety of international dishes, while light snacks and beverages can be sampled in the lobby bar.

The use of the sauna, hot tub, steam bath and a choice of massage and beauty treatments are at a surcharge. The reception desk works 24 hours a day.

The ruins of the ancient Thracian city of Perperikon, a popular attraction in the area, are reachable within a 20-minute drive by car. Kardzhali Dam offering swimming and camping options is 10 km away. Please note that from 8 February 2017 there will be renovations of the reception and lobby bar and the entrance will be from the hotel restaurant.

The air-conditioned rooms all offer lake views, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar and a bathroom with shower.

Description:
Boutique Hotel Evmolpia is set in a traditional Bulgarian Rennaissance house in the heart of Plovdiv Old Town, and just a 2-minute walk from Kapana District. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, as well as some free wine and the cheese bar.

The rooms are furnished with authentic antique beds and wardrobes and have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer, as well as tea and coffee facilities.

Evmolpia Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The hotel also offers car hire. Roman Theatre Plovdiv is 600 metres from Evmolpia Hotel, while International Fair Plovdiv is 900 metres from the property. Free parking is provided. Please inform Hotel Evmolpia in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Family Hotel Diana in Tsarevo is located just 50 metres away from the beach and offers you air-conditioned rooms with balcony, refrigerator and cable TV. The ons-site restaurant serves Bulgarian cuisine, pizza and barbecue food.

Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in the entire building and you can park your car for free on site. The reception is open 24 hours a day. Children can have fun on the playground while you relax on the benches in the garden.

A supermarket can be found just 50 metres from the Family Hotel Diana and the next bus station can be reached on foot in 10 minutes. The resort of Lozenets is 6 km away and the Old Town of Sozopol can be reached by car in half an hour. A deposit via bank wire is required in order to secure your reservation. Family Hotel Diana will contact you with instructions after booking.

Description:
Located in a quiet area in Lozenets, only 70 metres from the central beach, Hotel Tegel offers a large garden with barbecue facilities, free on-site parking and free WiFi in all areas. The village centre can be reached within a 5-minute walk.

The rooms at the Tegel all come with air conditioning, a TV with cable channels and a fridge. They also feature a balcony.

At the Hotel Tegel, a covered seating area in the garden, featuring a TV, is available to all guests. The property also houses a bar and a summer garden restaurant that work from May until October.

The guest house is situated 600 metres from Coral Beach and a bus station can be found within a 7-minute walk. Tsarevo is 7 km away. A deposit via bank wire is required to secure your reservation. Tegel Guest House will contact you with instructions after booking.

Please note that the restaurant and the lobby bar are closed during the winter.

Description:
This secluded British Columbia resort is located on the upper end of the Sunshine Coast.  A private balcony with view of the Strait of Georgia is featured in all accommodation.

A fully equipped kitchen and dining area are included in every spacious apartment or chalet at this resort.  The rustic-themed accommodation offers a separate living room.  Some provide a fireplace and multiple bathrooms.

Fishing on the private strip of beach is just 1 activity guests can enjoy at Resort Desolation. A kayak or canoe is offered free of use, and on-site laundry facilities are available.

Lund is 7 km from this resort.  The town of Powell River is a 30-minute drive away. Upon check-in photo identification and credit card is required. All special requests are subject to availability upon check-in. Special requests cannot be guaranteed and may incur additional charges.

Please note, there are no telephones provided in the accommodation at this property.  A pay telephone is available at the resort office.

No open fires are permitted at this property due to forest fire danger.

All guests should be aware that this property is in a wildlife area where bears and cougars are present.

Please note, apartments are reserved for adults only.

Please, note that reservations made to arrive from May 1st until and including June 30th are subject to 20.00 CAD non-refundable service charge.

Description:
Situated in the heart of Torontos Entertainment District, this apartment boasts a direct view of the CN Tower. It is 5 minutes walk from the Rogers Centre and 230 metres from the Metro Toronto Convention Centre.

This self-catering apartment has one bedroom with a queen bed. There is a sofa bed in the living room. The kitchen comes fully equipped for the preparation of meals. Additional amenities include free WiFi, a 43" flat-screen HDTV, cable channels and Netflix streaming. For added convenience, a washer and dryer can be found in the apartment. For guests travelling with a young child, the owner offers a foldable play-pen/crib and a high chair. Bi-weekly maid service is provided at no extra charge.

All guests have access to the buildings gym, hot tub, sauna, and yoga/spinning studio. There is also a billiards room and  rooftop seasonal pool.

This apartment is 4 minutes walk from the TIFF Bell Lightbox, the Princess of Wales Theatre and Royal Alexandra Theatre. Union Station, with VIA rail and subway connections, is 10 minutes walk away. Description:
An outdoor swimming pool with a waterfall and night lights can be enjoyed during the summer in Santa Cruz, at Posada Colchagua in a scenic natural environment a 20-minute drive from Colchagua Valley vineyards. Wi-Fi is free and a continental breakfast is offered daily.

Posada Colchagua is set in a cosy summer-style house with palm trees and shaded galleries. It features comfortable rooms with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and private bathrooms.

A panoramic terrace on the 2nd floor provides marvellous views.

Colchagua Museum and Santa Cruz bus station are 10 km away. Santiago city is a 3-hour drive and there is free public parking on site. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.

LOCAL TAX LAW.

The passenger wont be exempt from this fee when paying in local currency. In case of no show the invoice will be billed in local currency, including this additional fee (IVA).
This additional fee (IVA) is not included in the hotel rates and must be paid seperately.

HotelFacilities: designated smoking area Tour desk Wireless Internet Access Car Parking Elevator / Lift Room service

Description:
This hotel is located in the famous ancient temple of Chongsheng, 16 km from the railway station and about 21 km from the airport.

The architectural style of this hotel is in harmony with that of the Guanyin Palace and the Bell Tower in the park, which is a typical palace complex of the Tang Dynasty. Set in classical and elegant surroundings, it is nestled amongst beautiful flower gardens and tall green trees. It features pavilions, long corridors, small bridges connecting various pools, green grasslands and a unique scenery which will attract many Chinese and foreign visitors. Renovated in 2009, this city hotel comprises a total of 134 rooms. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception, a chess room and a breakfast/dining room. Guests can also take advantage of the room service for an additional fee.

All rooms come with a shower and offer a double bed. They are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV and Internet access. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning and heating are provided in all accommodation as standard.

The hotel with chess room.

The hotel's restaurants serve Dali, Sichuan and Cantonese dishes. Guests are served breakfast each morning and the midday and evening meals may be enjoyed in set menu form.

Description:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Casa San Luis, you''ll be centrally located in Duitama, steps from Duitama Cathedral and Plaza De Los Libertadores. This hotel is within the region of Innovo Plaza Duitama and Lancers Monument.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens. Your room comes with a Tempur-Pedic bed, and all rooms are furnished with king sofa beds. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. This Colonial hotel also features complimentary babysitting/childcare and a hair salon.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel''s 24-hour room service. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and a computer station. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and free self parking is available onsite.

Description:
Located just steps away from the beach and 4 km from Novigrad, Mediterranean Premium Village Holiday Homes features outdoor swimming pools, restaurants and self-catering accommodation surrounded by greenery. Free WiFi and free parking are provided.

Each air-conditioned mobile home comprises 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with a shower and an equipped kitchen with dining area and a flat-screen TV. The mobile homes are shaded with oak trees and guests can enjoy views of the surrounding vineyards.

On the campgrounds guests will find a supermarket, a couple of restaurants and a beach caf� and lounge bar. Mediterranean Premium Village Holiday Homes also comprises two outdoor swimming pools with sun decks.

The camp also features a show cooking restaurant serving local delicacies, a grill and barbecue restaurant and a lounge bar with a rich offer of finger food and cocktails. In addition, guests can use the mixed-use football, basketball and handball playground and outdoor fitness facilities or stroll by the seaside promenade and enjoy the sunset.

The newly renovated beach with a paved sunbathing area, sun loungers and showers, as well as some pebbly bays is located a short walk from the mobile homes. Both adults and children can enjoy a tidal bathing area with seawater. Various sports activities can be enjoyed in the immediate surroundings.

During high season guests can take part in evening entertainment programmes with dance music and there is organised children animation.

The nearest airport is Pula Airport, 70 km from the property. When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Payment is made at the reception in HRK or in EUR based on the current exchange rate on the day of payment.

Please note that your credit card will be charged in HRK (Croatian currency). Your bank hereinafter converts this amount to the currency of your domestic account. Due to your banks exchange rate this may result in a slightly different (higher) total charge than the amount stated in HRK on the hotel invoice.

Right next to Strandhotel Klitrosen you will find Svinkl�v Klitplantage both for nice walks and mountain bikes. 2 km in the opposite direction you will find the beautiful Fosdalen, which is a 1 km long ravine who cuts into the moraine hills, who is about 60 meters above sea level.

Description:
Set just outside Bastia in a business district facing the sea, Ostella offers a charming and elegant setting, comfortable accommodation, and a modern wellbeing centre. The hotel also features an electric vehicle charging station, free parking and parking spaces for motorbikes upon prior reservation.

Ostella features air-conditioned accommodation with a flat-screen TV and a balcony with sweeping views of the sea and surrounding mountains. 30 of the standard rooms and 20 of the superior rooms were renovated and decorated in a Corsican theme and 2 suites offer a whirlpool bath.The hotel also offers Canal+ and RMC sport channels.

The on-site restaurant is managed by Chef Mr. Rachid Elaoufi and serves a creative menu. Cocktails can also be enjoyed in the bar. A childrens menu is also available with a range of breakfast, lunch and dinner options. A buffet breakfast is served daily between 06:00 and 10:30 and includes a selection of Corsican, organic and gluten free products. Alternatively breakfast can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room between 07:00 and 12:00.

Guests have free access to the wellness centre, which measures 450 m� and features an indoor heated swimming pool, hot tub, and a fitness room with high-end cardio equipment. It also features a range of beauty treatments and therapies to aid relaxation and promote well being.

The wellness area is accessible to children every day during the following hours: 7 a.m. to 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. to 4 p.m. The jacuzzi is prohibited for minors under 16, in accordance with the provisions of the law

Small pets are allowed in some rooms , Please contact the property before arrival. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Hotel Restaurant & Spa LOstella in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that the restaurant is open for lunch from Monday to Friday and for dinner every day from May until October. From January to April and from October to December, the restaurant is closed all day on Saturday and Sunday.

Children under 4 years old are not permitted in the spa. Children under 15 years old are only allowed in the wellness centre during the week-ends French school holiday periods from 12:00 to 16:00 and must be accompanied by an adult.

Please note that extra beds are available upon request only and subject to hoteliers approval. Extra beds are not available in Superior room categories.

Please note that the restaurant is open for lunch from Monday to Friday and for dinner from Monday to Saturday. The restaurant is closed on Sunday until the end of April. From January to May and from October to December, the restaurant is closed all day on Saturday and Sunday.

Please note that the restaurant is closed from December, 23rd 2021 until January, 10th 2022.

The wellness area is accessible to children every day during the following hours: 7 a.m. to 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. to 4 p.m.

The jacuzzi is prohibited for minors under 16, in accordance with the provisions of the law.

The guest rooms at Hotel ClassEco Carcassonne are equipped with satellite channels and have shared bathrooms.

Guests of Hotel ClassEco Carcassonne can enjoy a continental breakfast every morning, in the dining room or on the garden terrace. The hotel staff are available to assist 24 hours a day.

Please note that towels are not provided. Guests can purchase them on site for a EUR 3 extra fee per towel.

Description:
Dating from the 1930s, Hotel de La Paix is set just a 5-minute walk from Cours Paoli in Corte. It offers a TV room, an on-site restaurant and free garage parking for motorbikes and bicycles.

The rooms at Hotel de La Paix feature views of the surrounding mountains and gardens. Decorated in a contemporary style, each one provides an en suite bathroom and some also have a private balcony.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, either in the dining room or on the terrace. You can also choose to relax in the bar with a drink before sampling traditional cuisine in the restaurant.

Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Luggage storage and newspapers can be found at reception. The old town and the leaving point for walks in the Tavignano Valley are a 5-minute walk away. If you expect to arrive after 18:00, please inform the property in advance. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

The restaurant is open from early April to the end of June, and for the month of September.

Please note that guests cannot exceed the maximal occupancy of the rooms.

Please note that this property accepts checks, holiday vouchers, cash, bank transfer

Description:
Le Domaine de Kerampape is located in Douarnenez, 2 km from the beaches. It offers self-catering accommodations with a terrace and a view of the garden. The living room features exposed beams and stone walls.

The accommodation will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Free Wi-Fi access is available on the outdoor terrace. There is an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and barbecue facilities.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. The property is situated 20 km from Quimper Train Station and 20 km from Pointe du Raz. It offers free parking. Please inform Le Domaine de Kerampape in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that prepayment is due by bank transfer or cheque. Please contact the property in advance to organise this.

Please note that a EUR 200 damages deposit will be requested upon arrival. This may be used to charge for any damages incurred to the accommodation during your stay.

Please note that electricity costs are not included in the price.

The studio features a garden view, a living area, a mezzanine bedroom with flat-screen TV and DVD player, desk, wardrobe and bathroom. Free WiFi access is available throughout.

The kitchenette is fully equipped with an oven, dishwasher and stove. A continental breakfast is provided the first night and is available at an additional charge after the first night.

Description:
Situated in Fayence, 49 km from Nice, Les chambres du Restaurant le Castellaras features an outdoor pool, seasonal outdoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available and free private parking is available on site.

Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. A flat-screen TV is provided.

Upon prior request, guests can have access to an exercise bench, 2 fitness machines, a hammam, a sauna, an outdoor hot tub and a Finnish sauna.

Le Bijou is a delightfully renovated farmhouse which offers 5 individual luxury double bedrooms for discerning Bed and Breakfast clientele.

The farmhouse boasts open aspects all round with spectacular views across the valley and surrounding vineyards. Featuring free WiFi and a seasonal outdoor pool, Le Bijou offers accommodation in Monestier, 25 km from Bergerac. Free private parking is available on site.

Description:
Offering a sun terrace, R�sidence Orelle 3 vall�es by Resid&Co is set in Orelle in the Rh�ne-Alps Region. 3 Vallees Express Gondola is 400 metres away. Free outdoor parking and paid indoor parking are available. Free WiFi is provided.

All units include a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a dining area and a kitchenette fitted with a microwave and toaster. A fridge and coffee machine are also featured. There is a private bathroom with a bath in every unit. Bed linen is provided free of charge.

R�sidence Orelle Resid&Co also includes a spa centre with an indoor pool, sauna, hammam, all of which are accessible free of charge. Guests can enjoy the bar and restaurant run by an independent service provider located in the main chalet.

The area is popular for skiing and hiking. Orelle Ski School is 1.4 km from R�sidence Orelle 3 vall�es by Resid&Co, while Plan Bouchet Ski Lift is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chamb�ry-Savoie Airport, 71 km from the property. Parking is subject to availability due to limited spaces.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform R�sidence Orelle 3 vall�es by Resid&Co in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A damage deposit of EUR 580 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 14 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Spa opening hours: - Every day from 11 a.m. to 7 p.m. and Saturday from 3 p.m. to 7 p.m.

Covered parking is available for a EUR 30 extra fee per week per vehicle if booked in advance, and available for a EUR 50 extra fee per week if booked upon arrival. Places allocated on arrival are subject to availability.

Please note that one pet can be accommodated per unit for an extra charge of EUR 79 per week for long stays and EUR 15 per pet per day for short stays.

Please note that end-of-stay cleaning is not included in the price. Guests can choose to clean the apartment themselves or to pay a cleaning fee, which ranges from EUR 50 to EUR 90 according to the apartment type. All guests must clean their kitchen areas and wash the dishes before check-out.

Please note that towels and bath lats are not included in the price. Guests can bring their own or can rent a towels kit onsite for an extra charge of EUR 6 per person per night and 12 eur/person for 7 nights.

Please note that extra bed linen will be charged at a rate of EUR 17 per double bed and EUR 12 per single bed. people under 16 must be accompanied by an adult in the spa area.

The bar and restaurant are managed independently of the accommodation (they are service providers external to the accommodation).

Description:
Offering a traditional restaurant, Le 6.3 Resto Home B&B is located a 3-minute walk from Port-en-Bessin-Huppain. It is set in a 19th-century building and is 10 minutes drive from the D-day Landing Beaches.

Guest rooms are elegantly decorated and they feature a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Each room has a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served every morning. The hosts can also prepare evening meals for you, if reserved in advance.

Private on-site parking is free and the B&B is 900 metres from Omaha Beach Golf Club. The town of Bayeux, with its famous Tapestry Museum, is only a 10-minute drive away.
