Description:
HotelDescription#Located in private and lightly wooded grounds, 5 km south of Porto-Vecchio (Corse-du-Sud), this villa enjoys a wonderful location, with some of the best beaches in Europe within easy reach. The typically Corsican town of Sartene is about 61 km away and the sandy beach of Santa Guilia is only about 3 km away.

The finca villa has been carefully designed and built to the highest standard and features 3 rooms. The spacious interior is on one level, fully air-conditioned and attractively furnished with contemporary fittings and a light colour scheme throughout. It offers air conditioning, a dining room and a car park.

The rooms all feature a double bed and air conditioning. The villa also offers a bath, shower, TV and Internet access. The kitchen comes with a fridge, cooker, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities. A washing machine, ironing set and a terrace also feature.

Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool, as well as the sun terrace with sun loungers and parasols. Activities offered for a fee include jet skiing, windsurfing, canoeing, horse riding, biking and golf, with Sp�rone golf course located approximately 2.5 km away. Guests can also relax on the sandy beach.

Description:
Hotel Du Mouton is a 14th-century hotel located in the heart of Ribeauvill� in the Alsace countryside.  It has a traditional restaurant and free public parking is available nearby.

The contemporary guest rooms each have a private bathroom and TV. Some enjoy views across the medieval town centre.

The hotel-restaurant du Mouton is a 14th century establishment. Completely renovated in 2022, it offers beautiful rooms all with air conditioning, minibars, walk-in showers and bathtubs in the suites.

The restaurant offers quality cuisine with Alsatian and French influences and the wine list alone tells you a lot about the wines of Alsace and France.

Du Mouton Hotel is 2.5 km from the 13th-century Chateau de Girsberg and 10 km from the Cigoland Theme Park. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
If you plan to arrive outside check-in times, please notify the hotel 24 hours in advance to get the access code and the instructions for obtaining your room key. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

Please note the reception and the restaurant are closed on Tuesdays and Wednesdays throughout the year. Guests arriving on these days can check in via telephone.

Description:
The Hotel La Reserve is located in the prestigious vineyards of Muscat Frontignan at the foot of the Gardiole, and ideal place for mountain biking and trekking. Ideally located just 7 km from the beaches of Frontignan, the beaches and the Bois des Aresquiers (Natura 2000 protected areas). It is the ideal place for mountain biking and leisurely treks.

All rooms have a private bathroom with shower and toilet, a fridge and a TV. The studios and apartments are equipped with a kitchen and can accommodate up to 6 people.

At the Reception, you will find the breakfast room as well as the snack bar where we serve hot and cold drinks, sandwiches and pizzas. The boutique offers a fine selection of local wines and regional products.

The hotel also has a private and closed car parking, a barbecue area with a petanque court and a ping-pong table. Free WIFI Internet access is available throughout the hotel free of charge. Please inform Hotel La Reserve in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Reception opening times from September to June:
Monday to Friday: 07:00 to 12:00 and 17:00 to 19:30.
Saturday: 07:30 to 12:00

The reception is closed on Sundays and on public holidays and breakfasts are only available by reservation.

In July and August, the reception is open everyday from 7:30 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. and from 5:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m.

IMPORTANT: Please inform the hotel in advance if you plan to arrive outside of these hours. The keys to your room will be placed in the automatic distributor at reception. The access codes are composed of the last six numbers of your telephone number that you indicated to us during your reservation. The distributor does not accept foreign credit cards.

Breakfast service is available upon reservation on Sundays from September to June.

Description:
The Ganter Hotel Mohren is an individually run hotel in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage island of Reichenau. It is a 3 minute walk from the famous Maria and Markus Cathedral.

All rooms at Ganter Hotel & Restaurant Mohren include a TV, an en suite bathroom, and many have a balcony.

From our hotel you can discover the most beautiful day trip destinations in Lake Bodensee and the islands old churches, vineyards and romantic beaches.

Guests are also welcome to relax in the hotel sauna and spa area. The restaurant has 4 different areas, a romantic terrace, and a modern bar area.

Ganter Hotel & Restaurant Mohren is 5.5 km from Reichenau (Baden) Train Station, and a 15 minute drive from the A7 motorway. Parking is available on site at the hotel. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
When travelling with pets, please note that an extra charge of EUR 15 per pet per night applies.

Please note until Easter the restaurant is closed on Sunday evening and Monday the whole day.

Description:
Within 40 km of Landestheater Mecklenburg and 26 km of Mirow Castle, Ferienhaus Rheinsberg SEE 8701 features free WiFi and a terrace.

The 1-bedroom holiday home features a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and oven, and 1 bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the holiday home.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go hiking and cycling nearby.

Kulturhaus Stadtgarten is 27 km from the holiday home, while Schloss Tornow is 34 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 130 km from Ferienhaus Rheinsberg SEE 8701. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
After booking, you will receive a separate booking confirmation from Zugvogel-Reisen GmbH. This will include information on payment, terms and conditions, contact details and key collection.Please be aware that all arrival information will be given after the full payment is done.

Description:

Description:
Situated in town of Zenting, Landhotel Neuhof offers comfortable rooms and a spacious wellness area. Visitors can use the salt water swimming pool and infrared cabin for free, and take part in the weekly activity program.

The bright rooms at Landhotel Neuhof all feature flat-screen satellite TV, a seating area, and a balcony. There is an en suite bathroom which includes a hairdryer.

The surrounding Bavarian countryside is ideal for hiking and cycling, and bikes can be rented from the hotel. It is 12 km to the Brotjacklriegel ski region, and guests can use the sauna and massage services for an extra charge.

A breakfast buffet is provided each morning, and the hotel restaurant serves a wide variety of meals using local products.

Landhotel Neuhof is 23 km from Vilshofen Train Station, and it is a 20-minute drive to the A3 motorway. Free public parking is available on site at the hotel.

Description:
The quietly located, family-run Golden Sun Boutique is an apartment complex with a swimming pool with pool-side snack bar and plenty of relaxing space equipped with sun loungers. The city centre is 200 metres away.

The well-furnished studios are painted in warm terracotta walls and offer private bathroom with shower, kitchenette with fridge, telephone and radio. Safety deposit boxes and air-conditioning are available on request and at a charge. Studios overlook the garden and pool.

Facilities at Golden Sun Boutique include a large TV screen with satellite channels and DVD player, as well as pool tables.

Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is 35 km away. A bus stops only 150 metres from the property.  Free Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout the hotel. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Address: 220,RAJIV GANDHI INFOTECH PARK,PH. 1,MANN RD HINJE PUNE
Description:
Soaring high above the up-market Koregaon Park area, which is famous for its business establishments and multi-cuisine restaurants, this hotel enjoys a strategic location in Rajiv Gandhi Infotech Park, Hinjewadi. It lies only 2 km from the railway station, 7 km from Pune Airport and 190 km from Mumbai International Airport.

This is a smart and sophisticated business hotel in Pune, and offers the ideal environment for discerning corporate guests. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service and a restaurant. Business travellers will appreciate the conference facilities and guests can also take advantage of the room and laundry services. There is parking available for those arriving by car.

All rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower/bathtub and a hairdryer. They are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, Internet access, a safe, a minibar and a fridge. Furthermore, tea and coffee making facilities, an ironing set and air conditioning are provided in all accommodation as standard.

The hotel features a beauty salon and guests can take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool or work out and rejuvenate at the gym. It is also possible to sweat it out in the steam room or relax with a spa treatment.

The hotel's multi-cuisine restaurant serves all kinds of mouth-watering dishes.

The hotel is 7 km away from Pune Airport; 2 km away from the Railway Station and 190 km away from the Mumabi International Airport.

Description:
Located near Calaverde Beach and Santa Margherita di Pula Beach, Casa vacanza Calaverde is in Fort Village and provides free private parking and a restaurant. This property offers access to ping-pong and tennis at the tennis court.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Casa vacanza Calaverde conveniently has both a private beach area and a barbecue.

Nora is 11 km from the accommodation, while Nora Archaeological Site is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Cagliari Elmas, 48 km from Casa vacanza Calaverde, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

With Bagno Bellarosa Beach reachable in 1 km, Happy Camp Mobile Homes in Camping Village Rosapineta provides accommodation, a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a bar. Free WiFi is provided.

There is a fully equipped kitchenette and a private bathroom.

There is a playground and a kids club offering various activities.

Location : With a stay at Borgo Egnazia in Fasano, you ll be steps from San Domenico Golf Club and a 4-minute drive from Egnazia Archeological Museum. This 5-star hotel is 7.5 mi (12.1 km) from Zoosafari and 16 mi (25.7 km) from Trulli of Alberobello.

Description:
Astor Hotel is set in a quiet area surrounded by fruit trees and offering a views of Merano, 5 km away. It features an outdoor pool, a sun terrace, and a garden.

All rooms and suites at Hotel Astor are stylish and comfortable. They include satellite TV, parquet floors, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Most have a balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast is served in the morning, on the terrace when the weather is pleasant. Dinner is a 4-course meal which includes local specialities and international recipes.

Guests of the Astor receive a discount at the Thermal Baths of Meran, a 7-minute drive from the property.

The Waalweg hiking trail to Meran starts 200 metres from the hotel, and several mountain biking trails are located in the surroundings.

Description:
Holiway Home Valarin Roma is set in Vercana and offers free bikes and a terrace. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.3 km from Lake Como Beach, and guests benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub.

Guests can swim in the indoor pool, relax in the garden, or go hiking or cycling.

The nearest airport is Orio Al Serio International, 94 km from the apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.  A damage deposit of EUR 150 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A surcharge of EUR 50 applies for arrivals after 21:00. All requests for late arrival are subject to confirmation by the property.

Description:
Hotel Santa Lucia is comprised of several buildings and facilities in the enchanted setting of Tropea, one of Calabrias renowned seaside locations.

Enjoy the Santa Lucias wonderful swimming pool, equipped with with deck chairs and parasols. Further entertainment is assured in Santa Lucia 5-a-side football pitch and tennis courts.

A nearby private beach, also equipped with deckchairs and parasols, is serviced by a free shuttle bus that links Hotel Santa Lucia to the seaside and city centre of Tropea.

The Santa Lucia also provides shuttle transfer to/from the Tropea and Parghelia Railway Stations.

The comfortable guest rooms feature a modern design and a sitting area.They all offer sea or hill view.

During summer the hotel may only be bookable for long stays of 2 or more nights. Please inform Hotel Santa Lucia in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Le Beau Rivage offers rooms in a monumental 1892 building, only 200 metres from Middelburg Railway Station. It is set next to the canal and features buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

The rooms at Hotel Le Beau Rivage come with a work desk and a flat-screen TV with a wide range of international channels. Each bathroom has either a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Bike storage and electronic bike chargers are available.

The Zeeuws Museum is a 10-minute walk from Beau Rivage. Vlissingen and the beach are a 15-minute drive from the hotel. The centre of Antwerpen is 45 minutes� drive away. Please inform Hotel Le Beau Rivage in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
If you expect to arrive after 18:00 hrs, please inform the property as soon as possible in order for the self check-in process to be prepared. You can use the contact details provided in your confirmation.

At arrival you can pick up a parking card that allows you to park your car at a discounted rate. Please note that the hotel has no elevator and is difficult for guests with limited mobility to access.

Description:
Located in the Vallecito neighbourhood in Arequipa, Royal Village Guest House offers free WiFi and a complimentary American breakfast. The city�s historical centre is 1 km away.

Rooms at Royal Village Guest House feature private bathrooms with 24/7 hot water and cable TV.

Tourism information is provided and a computer is available for guest use. The 24-hour front desk can arrange laundry services and shuttle services to and from the airport or bus terminal for an extra fee. Spanish lessons are available.

Parking, which must be requested in advance, is available for an extra fee. Please inform Royal Village Guest House in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Non-Spanish-speaking guests get 1 hour of Spanish lessons when staying for more than 2 nights.

Based on local tax laws, Peruvian citizens (and foreigners staying more than 59 days in Peru) must pay an additional fee of 18%. To be exempt from this 18% additional fee (IVA), a copy of the immigration card and passport must be presented.

Please note both documents are required for fee exemption. Guests who are not able to present both documents will be required to pay the fee.

Foreign business travellers who require a printed invoice, will also be charged the additional 18% regardless of the length of their stay in Peru. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Description:
Well-positioned in Gangnam, the hotel is the ideal point of departure for excursions in and around Seoul. The hotel lies 2 km from the city centre and provides easy access to all of the most important parts of the city and its must-see destinations. Seoul-Gimpo International Airport is approximately 30 km from the hotel and Incheon International Airport is roughly 50 km away.

Guests can choose from 42 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony. The air-conditioned city hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures guests have plenty to do during their stay. Whatever guests' purpose of visit, the hotel is an excellent choice for any stay in Seoul. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service, as well as lift access to the upper floors.

All rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower/bathtub and a hairdryer, and offer a satellite TV and a mini fridge.

Description:
This complex is quietly situated in the centre of Puerto del Carmen. Numerous shopping venues, restaurants, bars and nightclubs as well as local public transport networks are all located in the hotel's vicinity. The nearest beach is 400 m from the hotel.

Built in 1986 and renovated in 2006, this 3-storey complex has a total of 68 apartments (64 one-room apartments and 4 two-room apartments). The foyer features a reception, a hotel safe, a currency exchange and luggage storage. The complex additionally includes a bar, a games room, a restaurant, Internet access (for an additional fee), excursion organiser, bike rental and car rental. Younger guests are offered a kids' club during the school holidays. Parking spaces are available on the street for those arriving by car.

The apartments have an en suite bathroom, direct dial telephone, satellite TV (fees apply), a hire safe, a kitchenette with a fridge and an oven, a seating area as well as a balcony or terrace.

The complex features a swimming pool (heated in the winter) for adults and children, sun loungers, parasols and a poolside bar. In addition, it is possible to enjoy the spa offerings, go diving, cycling or mountain biking, or play table tennis or snooker (for an additional fee). An entertainment programme for guests of all ages is offered as added amusement. The nearest golf course is around 16 km away.

The hotel offers bed and breakfast as well as a half-board stay. Guests are served a continental, English or Scandinavian breakfast each morning. The evening meal is served in the restaurant and guests may select starters, main course dishes and desserts.

Description:
Located in the coastal town of North Berwick, Nether Abbey Hotel boasts elegant rooms, a restaurant, free Wi-Fi, and free parking. Golfers can enjoy exciting courses along the coast, including North Berwick Golf Club, a 3-minute drive away; golf tours can be arranged at the hotel.

Each room at Nether Abbey Hotel features an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, a flat-screen TV, and tea/coffee making facilities. The rooms are elegantly decorated and feature high ceilings. there are 12 rooms in total and 6 rooms have sea views.

A full Scottish breakfast is included and is freshly cooked to order using locally sourced produce where possible. The award-winning, on-site restaurant offers a varied menu; all food is homemade and the restaurant specialises in fresh seafood and lobsters.

The train station is a 4-minute walk away and offers regular trains to Edinburgh, which can be reached in 25 minutes.

St Andrews and its famous golfing is around 90 miles from the property. Please inform Nether Abbey Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
